Texts.LongWelcomeMessage: Welcome to the application. This is a startup project based on the ABP framework. For more information visit abp.io.
Texts.NewsletterInfo: Get information about the latest happenings.
Texts.HomeHeaderMessage: Avdar Albo-Israel's leading company in the supply of metals to industries
Texts.HomeLongCardMessage: Avdar Albo specializes in the supply of metals to industries. The company started in 1993 and went through a lot of changes along the way, until recently-reborn.
